member.name: ICONINFO
member.summary: Contains information about an icon or a cursor.

member.name: ICONINFO.fIcon
member.summary: Specifies whether this structure defines an icon or a cursor. A value of TRUE specifies an icon; FALSE specifies a cursor.

member.name: ICONINFO.xHotspot
member.summary: The x-coordinate of a cursor's hot spot. If this structure defines an icon, the hot spot is always in the center of the icon, and this member is ignored.

member.name: ICONINFO.yHotspot
member.summary: The y-coordinate of the cursor's hot spot. If this structure defines an icon, the hot spot is always in the center of the icon, and this member is ignored.

member.name: ICONINFO.hbmMask
member.summary: A handle to the icon monochrome mask bitmap.

member.name: ICONINFO.hbmColor
member.summary: A handle to the icon color bitmap.
